casebody.data:
DOSS, et al.
v.
ADAMS, et al. 1PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 21, 2017 David C. Pishko, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Doss, Regina Radford, et al. Cynthia L. Van Horne, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Adams, Brenton D., et al.

E. Fitzgerald Parnell, III, Attorney at Law.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 23rd of June 2017 to Dismiss Petition and Appeal:

*638"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of July 2017."
